Name: USS Day
Namesake: Chief Petty Officer Francis Daniel Day
Sponsored by: Miss G. Day (sister of Francis Day)
awards: Two battle stars for World War II service
Armament:
2 × 5 in/38 cal (127 mm) (2×1)
4 × 40-mm (2×2)
10 × 20 mm (10×1)
3 × 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes (1×3)
1 Hedgehog depth bomb thrower
8 depth charge projectors (8×1)
2 depth charge racks
